header.title: crashdump_viewer

erlref.modulesummary: A WxWidgets based tool for browsing Erlang crashdumps.

description.p: The Crashdump Viewer is a WxWidgets based tool for browsing Erlang crashdumps.
For details about how to get started with the Crashdump Viewer, see the User's Guide.

desc.p: Starts the Crashdump Viewer GUI and loads the specified crashdump.
If File is not specified, a file dialog is opened where the crashdump can be selected.
Terminates the Crashdump Viewer and closes all GUI windows.
